body:
File: compiler/js-operator.{h,cc}
Definitions and relevant operators:
- const Operator* JSOperatorBuilder::CreateWithContext(ScopeInfoRef scope_info); (js-operator.h ~1115; js-operator.cc ~1505) -> IrOpcode::kJSCreateWithContext, properties Operator::kNoProperties, value inputs: object, outputs: 1; parameter is ScopeInfoRef.
- const Operator* JSOperatorBuilder::HasContextExtension(size_t depth); (h:1066, cc:1223) -> IrOpcode::kJSHasContextExtension, Operator::kNoWrite|kNoThrow; parameter depth.
- const Operator* JSOperatorBuilder::LoadContext(size_t depth, size_t index, bool immutable); (h:1067, cc:1232)
- const Operator* JSOperatorBuilder::LoadScriptContext(size_t depth, size_t index); (h:1068, cc:1243)
- const Operator* JSOperatorBuilder::StoreContext(size_t depth, size_t index); (h:1069, cc:1254)
- const Operator* JSOperatorBuilder::StoreScriptContext(size_t depth, size_t index); (h:1070, cc:1264)
- const Operator* JSOperatorBuilder::LoadGlobal(NameRef name, const FeedbackSource& feedback, TypeofMode typeof_mode); (h:1061, cc:1196)
- const Operator* JSOperatorBuilder::ToObject(); (h:945, cc CACHED_OP_LIST -> JSOperatorBuilder::ToObject uses Operator::kFoldable)
Also helper parameter extractors and printing:
- ScopeInfoRef ScopeInfoOf(const Operator* op) (h end; cc around 1820+) returns ScopeInfoRef for CreateWith/Catch/Block ops.
- ContextAccessOf, LoadGlobalParametersOf etc for access to parameters.
explanation: This entry records the JS operator definitions used by Ignition->TurboFan: CreateWithContext, HasContextExtension, Load/Store Context and ScriptContext, LoadGlobal and ToObject. These are referenced by BytecodeGraphBuilder fast/slow paths and by js-generic-lowering.
